title: The Wedding Bride Too
description: Jed Mosely schemes to make all weddings illegal as revenge on Stella and Tony. There goes the honeymoon!
altHero: Chris Kataan as Jed Mosely making an obnoxious face as he writes a letter with a feather
alt1: Jed wearing a polo with a popped collar
alt2: Jon Heder as Narshall who enters the room with chocolate all over his hand and mouth
alt4: Jed and Narshall cuddle a snow-covered car
